div.bibl: DIE ABENDPOST, May 16th, 1892. The German Lutherans and Politics.

body.p: The Execuive-Committee of the Illinois German Lutherans formally decided to support the Democratic Party during the coming election. A meeting of representatives from all German Lutheran Congregations will be held this coming Wednesday. The political agitation is in full swing and organized by the Independent German-American Citizens Blub, which has engaged a speaker for a meeting at the St. Jacob Hall, corner Garfield and Tremond Street.
